name: yuvasetu-platform
description: Complete internship platform connecting students with employers through AI-powered job matching
author: YuvaSetu Team

scripts.dev:all: echo "Start backends in two terminals: npm run dev:be-emp & npm run dev:be-stu" && echo "Then start frontends: npm run dev:fe-emp & npm run dev:fe-admin & npm run dev:fe-stu"
scripts.install:all: npm run install:frontend && npm run install:backend
scripts.install:frontend: cd frontend/student && npm install && cd ../employer && npm install && cd ../admin && npm install && cd ../../open-resume && npm install
scripts.install:backend: echo "Please run backend installation manually as shown in README.md"
scripts.build:frontend: cd frontend/student && npm run build && cd ../employer && npm run build && cd ../admin && npm run build
